attributes.action: Amend the highway code for cyclists and pedestrians due to emissions and safety
attributes.additional_details: Worthy or not also with the emissions and global warming being stuck behind a cyclist with ques and ques of traffic would impact dramatically if it's a busy road, let alone stopping at every junction to allow a pedestrian to cross and having to accelerate, instead of a slow consistent speed round... Something to think about as we're was told we need to think of the future and our planet..
attributes.background: Tax and insurance with Mots should be under taken with possible helmet cams as they are road users by law they should have these in place for insurance and road worthy purposes. Some cyclists remove brakes and modify their bikes for extreme sports which insurances and MOTs should see if it's road...

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require cyclists have lights, license plate and insurance to use the roads: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604266

Introduce testing, tax and vehicle registration/MOT requirements for cyclists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607217
